H3.text: Which film is set on the remote Hebridean island of Summerisle. The wickerman

A4.text: The Wicker Man is a 1973 British folk horror film set on the fictional, isolated Scottish island of Summerisle.

A5.text: The plot centres on the visit of Sergeant Neil Howie to the isolated Scottish island of Summerisle.
